name: SurgeryDigestiveSystemKidney
title: Surgery Digestive System Kidney
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains CPT codes associated with Surgery Digestive System Kidney.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with Surgery Digestive System Kidney.),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT codes associated with Surgery Digestive System Kidney are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with Surgery Digestive System Kidney are excluded from this value set. Codes captured in systems other than CPT are also excluded from the value set.)
